E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1974
Subject: Status of Ed Crosby
Dear Sir,
Ed Crosby has an AVG of .247 at AA San Antonio Brewers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/23/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Jack Brohamer



Date: Monday, 5/26/1974
Subject: Kurt Bevacqua healing process
Kurt Bevacqua is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
